sense.gloss: to read and understand, to take in
to sense from external cues, to read (someone's) mind
to read (calibration, tape, etc.), to scan (bar code), to read (out)

sdata.j: ↑言外↑↓げんがい↓の↑意味↑↓いみ↓を↑読↑↓|よ↓み↑取↑↓と↓る|ならば、この↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓はお↑金↑↓かね↓の↑無心↑↓むしん↓です。
sdata.e: If you read between the lines, this letter is a request for money.
